pkgmetadata.longdescription: Covfefy Any Word, Sentence or Speech // Converts any word, sentence or speech into Trump's infamous "covfefe" format. Reference: https://www.nytimes.com/2017/05/31/us/politics /covfefe-trump-twitter.html. Inspiration thanks to: https://cod egolf.stackexchange.com/questions/123685/covfefify-a-string.
